description: This vibrant vegetarian sheet pan dinner is made with za'atar roasted veggies served over rice or quinoa and topped with a creamy miso-tahini sauce.
keywords: vegetarian sheet pan dinner, za'atar roasted veggies, Za'atar-Spiced Veggie Sheet Pan Dinner
name: Za'atar-Spiced Veggie Sheet Pan Dinner with Tahini Miso Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 ear sweet corn (shucked and cut into 1" slices)
1/2 head cauliflower (cored and sliced into florets)
1 small red bell pepper (sliced into 1" pieces)
1 small head broccoli (cored and sliced into florets)
2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil or melted coconut oil
3 cups cooked rice (cooked quinoa, or small cooked pasta (such as orzo)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425Â°F, and place one rack in the lower third position. Line a large, rimmed baking pan with foil, parchment paper, or a silicone mat (for easy clean-up).
